column2: I knew I was going to go with Pancakes or a Burger. I teetered about 7 times before making my decision. To clear my head
column3: I decided to place an order for the Goat Chili. It came served with cheddar cheese
column8: in essence. The chili was quite small in size
column9: but it was my favorite part of the meal. I had never tried goat
column10: but I could definitely tell the difference from beef. As usual with exotic meats
column11: it was a bit gamier. I really enjoyed it. The jalepenos were a bit sweet
column13: because I'm not a huge spicy guy. I like some kick
